name: Astraphobia
description:
Rain started pouring while a teen was playing in a forest. Unfortunately, a slight misstep caused him to fall and pass out. After regaining consciousness, he wakes up to find himself all alone in the dark forest, with the addition of a thunderstorm lighting up the place. Suddenly a ball of light appears, as it reaches in front of him it stops and begins to speak. The ball of light introduces itself as a spirit and tells the teen that it will help him find his way back but to do that, he will have to deal with his biggest fears and that is thunder and lightning. With no other option, he will need to overcome his fear in order to return home.

Astraphobia is a 2d puzzle-platform video game. Player play as a young teen who afraid of lightning using his fear to find his way out the dark forest. The game’s main feature is using lighting to illuminate the surroundings and solve the environmental puzzle. At the same time, lighting also causes stress to the teen, reaching certain of stress level will cause the teen over frightened and die.
